headline: PPG celebrates 3,000th installation of PPG MOONWALK paint mixing system at U.S. collision center
summary: PITTSBURGH, August 14, 2025--PPG (NYSE: PPG) today announced that it has completed the 3,000th global installation of its PPG MOONWALK® automated paint mixing system at Wren’s Collision Group’s facility in Auburn, Ala. Since its launch in 2019, the PPG MoonWalk system has transformed body shop operations worldwide by delivering exceptional accuracy, traceability and productivity across the automotive repair process.

headline: PPG Enters Distributor Partnership With GPA for Teslin Substrates
summary: PPG expands Teslin synthetic paper reach through new GPA deal, boosting access for global print and label markets.
